title: Markets And The Fed In 2022
itunes:title: Markets And The Fed In 2022
description:
Rebecca Felton, Senior Market Strategist at Riverfront Investment Group, discusses the state of the economy and gives her market outlook for 2022. Darren Chervitz, Portfolio Manager at Jacob Asset Management, talks about markets and investment strategies in 2022. Katerina Simonetti, Senior Vice President at Morgan Stanley, talks about inflation and volatility. David Katz, President and CIO of Matrix Asset Advisors, talks about investment strategies and market optimism in 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
